Public MustInherit Class PresentationSource Inherits DispatcherObject

summary.span: 提供将其他技术的内容呈现为互操作方案的一部分的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base for classes that present content from another technology as part of an interoperation scenario.

summary.span: 此外，此类还提供用于处理这些源的静态方法，以及基本可视层表示体系结构。

span.span: In addition, this class provides static methods for working with these sources, as well as the basic visual-layer presentation architecture.
to derive from this class.
Associated enumeration: .

span.span: Adds a derived class instance to the list of known presentation sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由派生类，以指示它们需要进行跟踪，应调用此方法。This method should be called by derived classes to indicate that they need to be tracked.

summary.span: 将 事件的处理程序添加到提供的元素中。

span.span: Adds a handler for the event to the provided element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此事件的语法块的状态，都不存在合法[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]附加属性用法。Despite what the syntax block for this event states, there is no legitimate [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] attached property usage. 不应尝试将处理程序中的添加[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，并在代码中的处理程序应仅将其置于充当演示文稿的主机的对象 ( ) 内容。You should not attempt to add handlers in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], and handlers in code should only be placed on objects that serve as hosts for presentation ( ) content. 此类处理程序只应在对象初始化过程中附加，应在 Dispose 方法或等效对象清理中显式删除。Such handlers should only be attached during object initialization, and should be explicitly removed in a Dispose method or equivalent object cleanup. 尽管这是路由的事件，有特殊限制在此事件上放置，不同于正常的路由的事件行为，由于自己考虑这种处理一个典型应用场景中的元素的相对较小的数事件。Even though this is a routed event, there are special restrictions placed on this event that differ from normal routed event behavior, due to the relatively small number of elements in a typical application scenario that would concern themselves with handling this event. - 不能使用或添加处理程序的方法。You cannot use the or methods to add handlers. 必须使用。You must use . - C#`+=`和`-=`事件处理程序语法以及相关的特定于语言的处理程序语法不支持，因为事件本身未公开为公共。The C# `+=` and `-=` event handler syntaxes, and related language-specific handler syntaxes, are not supported, because the event itself is not exposed as public. 仅实用工具方法，用于添加和移除处理程序，直接支持。Only the utility methods for adding and removing the handlers directly are supported. - 不允许类处理程序。Class handlers are not allowed. 具体而言，不能调用类构造函数中此事件针对因为尽管 SourceChanged 中存在的标识符字段，但该标识符不是公共。Specifically, you cannot call against this event in a class constructor because although an identifier field exists for SourceChanged, the identifier is not public. - 所有已注册处理程序将收到 SourceChanged 事件，即使其中一个处理程序会尝试将参数标记为已处理。All registered handlers will receive the SourceChanged event even if one of the handlers attempts to mark the arguments as handled.

permission.span: 若要调用或实现此方法。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管这是路由的事件，有特殊限制在此事件上放置，不同于正常的路由的事件行为，由于自己考虑这种处理一个典型应用场景中的元素的相对较小的数事件。Even though this is a routed event, there are special restrictions placed on this event that differ from normal routed event behavior, due to the relatively small number of elements in a typical application scenario that would concern themselves with handling this event. - 不能使用或方法来移除处理程序。You cannot use the or methods to remove handlers. 必须使用。You must use . - C#`+=`和`-=`事件处理程序语法以及其他特定于语言的处理程序语法，不支持，因为事件本身未公开为公共。The C# `+=` and `-=` event handler syntaxes, and other language-specific handler syntaxes, are not supported, because the event itself is not exposed as public. 仅实用工具方法，用于添加和移除处理程序，直接支持。Only the utility methods for adding and removing the handlers directly are supported.

MemberSignature.Value: protected void RootChanged (System.Windows.Media.Visual oldRoot, System.Windows.Media.Visual newRoot);
.method familyhidebysig instance void RootChanged(class System.Windows.Media.Visual oldRoot, class System.Windows.Media.Visual newRoot) cil managed
Protected Sub RootChanged (oldRoot As Visual, newRoot As Visual)

span.span: The old root .
The new root .

summary.span: 提供根 已发生更改的通知。

span.span: Provides notification that the root has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类应调用此方法，以指明其根已更改。Derived classes should call this method to indicate that their root has changed. 当且仅当这些根视觉对象都可以调用此方法会导致两个要在对指定的根视觉对象，引发的对象生存期事件派生的类。Calling this method causes two object lifetime events to be raised on the specified root visuals, if and only if those root visuals are derived classes. - 旧的根可视化对象将引发事件，并将处理其元素树的向下，广播到每个子元素的此事件。The old root visual will raise the event, and will process its tree of elements downward, broadcasting this event to each child element. - 新的根可视化对象将引发事件，并将处理其元素树的向下，广播到每个子元素的此事件。The new root visual will raise the event, and will process its tree of elements downward, broadcasting this event to each child element.
